ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 1174
ygData.msgSnippet: As a level 66 druid who s been playing for over 4 years, I m still in the same boat.  I don t get to the evil areas much just cause I don t really have a
ygData.messageBody:
As a level 66 druid who's been playing for over 4 years, I'm still in the same boat.  I don't get to the evil areas much just cause I don't really have a reasont o go as a druid.  I do have dark elf characters which might get me into Neriak now and then, but by and large I dont play ogres, trolls, or iksars.  There are just some zones I find I have no reason to frequent unless I'm questing.  With that said, I'm still not flagged for many zones such as Vex Thal, the Elemental planes, Howling Stones, and Time, mainly because I've never had the urge or capabilities of being in a group that's doing flagging for those zones.  In most cases I have all but one or two items needed to finish certain keys/flags and then just left it at that to go about leveling or whatnot.  So as of level 66 I still haven't been to every zone in the game.  I know some folks that have, but they're usually in very large raiding guilds.  There's plenty of places for me to go otherwise.
 
Wulfric
 
 
 
 
 
----- Original Message -----
From: Steven R. Hulse
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, June 02, 2005 8:29 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 1174

Now hold up there. lol, In defense of some of the actual ones that may
not be an eBay toon I for one will have to say that as a lvl 42 there
are still places I have not been to and don't know how to get to. I've
been plying for over 2 years now with the same account I've had since
I've started. I still consider myself a noob and always will be until I
feel that I have accomplished everything that I have wanted to. granted
part of my limited experience is due to the fact I find a place and will
hang out there for a while until I feel that I can move on. I tend to
play solo the majority of the time mostly due to time constraints but it
works for me. I've only been to the dark areas (Gunthak, FoB, and
others) only a couple of times and I still have to ask which stone I
need to take to get there at times! LOL

Durgaa - Member of Mystic Crusaders on Bristlebane
